title: Champignon's Growing Business In Belarus For Sale
text: Working champignon's growing business in Belarus for sale Sale business for growing mushrooms. The company is located in Belarus, Vitebsk region. BENEFITS OF THE ACQUISITION OF BUSINESS: High demand for products, the lack of competition in the region, lower taxes, proximity of Russia as a promising market, fully renovated buildings, proximity to the city of Vitebsk with a good road (11 km from the city). The enterprise has PROPERTY building (700 m2), carried out the electrification of production (has its own transformer substation), water (own well + summing rural water), sewage. The building has an administrative part (about 100 m2) and production (planned out for 4 growing cameras + industrial corridor). At the moment, three cameras are in working order, the 4th stage of readiness 70%. The building has installed all the equipment necessary to conduct business. There freezer, boiler room. It is possible to expand production at the expense of surrounding areas. The enterprise. The company has conducted activities throughout the year. The monthly turnover was equivalent to $ 15,000. Worked 4 people on a permanent basis (Director, Technology, 2 workers), plus a team of pickers (periodically attracted) about 6-8 people. All additional information you can get on the phone +375 44 7966044 Financials
